(Simplified: 蓠)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 離 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 離 [ lí ] rare beast; strange; elegant
①(江蘺)a。紅藻的一種，生長在海灣淺水中，可用來製造瓊脂；b。古書上說的一種香草。
蘺笆 [ lí ba ]: (n) bamboo fence

蘺字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘺； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1071第27
【唐韻】呂支切【韻會】鄰知切，?音離。【說文】江蘺蘼蕪。【爾雅註】楚謂之蘺，晉謂之䖀，齊謂之茝。【司馬相如·上林賦】被以江蘺。　又【淮南子·秦族訓】蘺先稻熟，而農夫薅之者，不以小利害大穫。【註】蘺，水稗也。　又藩蘺。【前漢·陳涉項籍傳贊】築長城而守藩蘺。　又【唐韻古音】音羅。《離騷》又况揭車與江蘺。叶上華字。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　蓠; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1071 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Lv Zhiqie [Rhyme Meeting] Neighbors know each other, and sound away. [Said the text] Jiang Liao Wu Wu. 【Erya Note】Chu is called 蓠, Jin is called 薀, Qi is called 茝. [Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] is regarded as Gracilaria.　[Huainanzi·Qin Clan Training] The rice is ripe first, and the farmer does not make a big profit with a small profit. [Note] 蓠, water barnyard also.　Fan Ling again. [Previous Han·Chen Shexiang's Biography] Build the Great Wall while guarding the vassal.　[Tang Yun Ancient Sound] Yin Luo. "Li Sao" is also about Jie Che and Grahama. Ye Shanghua word.
